thread.section_title: FlightHub Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of FlightHub | flighthub.com | 3 of 1735
thread.title: Steve T.

author: Steve T.
title: Steve T.
text:
I bought air ticket from Dusseldorf to Milan for AlItalia.
The process is smooth but however, you must be careful to not buying additional items if you do not want to such as travel cancellation or travel insurance because the website tries to add it automatically.
You must deliberately check the box telling that you do not want to buy any of those.
I do not give 5 start because the website does not tell anything about the baggage allowance. If you buy directly from AlItalia website, they tell us.
FlightHub website however, give a selection if you want to see the price either in Cad$ or US$.
Other good feature is that you can select the seat directly but again, the website did not give you information in advance how much would it cost to select a seat.
